mapper.select:
select obj.id,c.title,c.cover avatar,obj.sbu,obj.quantity,obj.sale_price,obj.object_val,obj.cell_id,c.brand_id,r.tag from market_object obj left join market_object_record r on r.obj_id = obj.id left join cell c on c.id = obj.cell_id where 1 = 1 and r.tag = '2'
AND locate(#{q}, c.title)>0

select obj.id,c.title,obj.sbu,obj.quantity,obj.sale_price,obj.object_val,r.debit_id,r.credit_id from market_object obj left join market_object_record r on r.obj_id = obj.id left join cell c on c.id = obj.cell_id where obj.id=#{obj_id}

select obj.id,r.swap_no,c.title,c.cover avatar,obj.sbu,obj.quantity,obj.sale_price,obj.object_val,obj.cell_id,c.brand_id,r.tag from market_object obj left join market_object_record r on r.obj_id = obj.id left join cell c on c.id = obj.cell_id where r.mark = #{mark} and r.credit_id = #{credit_id}
AND r.od='1'

select obj.id,r.swap_no,c.title,c.cover avatar,obj.sbu,obj.quantity,obj.sale_price,obj.object_val,obj.cell_id,c.brand_id,r.tag from market_object obj left join market_object_record r on r.obj_id = obj.id left join cell c on c.id = obj.cell_id where r.mark = #{mark} and r.debit_id = #{debit_id}

select obj.id,r.swap_no,c.title,c.cover avatar,obj.sbu,obj.quantity,obj.sale_price,obj.object_val,obj.cell_id,c.brand_id,r.tag from market_object obj left join market_object_record r on r.obj_id = obj.id left join cell c on c.id = obj.cell_id where r.od = #{dto.od} and r.swap_no = #{dto.swapNo}
